articles.author: Isabella Volmert
articles.title: Redistricting in Indiana faces ultimate test in state Senate - AP News
articles.description: Indiana state senators are gathering in Indianapolis to finally weigh in on mid-cycle redistricting. A new congressional map already approved by the House would give the Republican Party the chance to win all nine seats. It's still unknown if enough Senators …
articles.content: A proposal to redraw Indianas congressional boundaries faces its first public test in the state Senate on Monday, with no clarity on whether it can pass a final vote later in the week despite months … [+3598 chars]
